item.title: Musk’s SpaceX Agrees to Buy EchoStar Spectrum for $17 Billion
item.description: SpaceX, the Elon Musk-backed company that owns the Starlink satellite network, agreed to acquire wireless spectrum from Charlie Ergen’s EchoStar Corp. for about $17 billion in cash and stock.

item.title: Musk’s SpaceX Agrees to Buy EchoStar Spectrum for $17 Billion
item.description: SpaceX, the Elon Musk-backed company that owns the Starlink satellite network, agreed to acquire wireless spectrum from Charlie Ergen’s EchoStar Corp. for about $17 billion in cash and stock.
